channel.title: task on Gaurav's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in task on Gaurav's Blog

item.title: Project Spice Universe
item.description: My First Sem Project: Spice Universe is a text based Action-Adventure game. Enter in the Spice Universe and enjoy a small dose of reality escape from the day-to-day life. It’s got about 15-30 minutes of gameplay with immersive stories and 4 different classes to choose from. There are 4 different stats of enemies. For Extensive Review and To play the game Feel free to go to my github page.

item.title: Starting My first Project
item.description: April 2022: A Text Based Action-Adventure Game: I will be starting my first every project using basic c++ and I will be making a text based game, more information about the software will be added to the blog very soon. See Ya Around

item.title: Weekly Update
item.description: Weekly Update: Problems to solve during next week: Watson asks Does Permutation Exist(https://www.codechef.com/problems/PERMEXIS)游릭 Chef and digits of a number(https://www.codechef.com/problems/LONGSEQ)游릭 Making a Meal(https://www.codechef.com/problems/CFMM)游릭 Jumping in the hills(https://www.codechef.com/problems/HILLS)游릭 New Piece(https://www.codechef.com/problems/NEWPIECE)游릭 Version Control System(https://www.codechef.com/problems/VCS)游릭 A Subtask Problem(https://www.codechef.com/problems/SUBTASK)游릭 Odd Repeat(https://www.codechef.com/problems/REPEAT)游릭

item.title: My Own Blog Site
item.description: I have created my first blog website where i will be adding more posts as soon as I figure this out. See Y’all soon.
